summary:
Do you have what it takes to survive? Are you ready to make decisions that will decide the fate of others?

This is a horror quest that will take you through scary places, give you puzzles to solve and decisions to make. Depending on your decisions you will get a different ending. The mod is of course fully voiced.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i1067.photobucket.com/albums/u429/illerification/Eyes-1.jpg[/img][/center]Do you have what it takes to survive? Are you ready to make decisions that will decide the fate of others?

This is a horror quest that will take you through scary places, give you puzzles to solve and decisions to make. Depending on your decisions you will get a different ending. The mod is of course fully voiced.

You don't need to go anywhere or do anything to get the quest started. Just load a save.

I got inspiration to this mod from watching a certain youtuber who plays Amnesia. Those of you who are familiar with this game may recognize some noises and music from it.

Because of the fact that this is a horror quest, [color=#FF0000]it's not recommended to use any spells that generate light[/color], no matter how scary it might become. It can at some points ruin the scary feeling.

If you are stuck in any way, have a question or just want to give your opinion on the mod, feel free to make a comment in the comment section. When commenting a spoiler, please use: [spoilerREMOVEME] "The Spoiler" [/spoilerREMOVEME].
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#008000]-:Thanks:- [/color]
I would like to thank the people who helped me with the voice acting in the mod (steam names):

"Joi_kind" as Grim Harpen and Clodius Dextios
"Gud" as Jerry Manfred
"Elijah Lucian" as Lord Balmer (http://elijahlucian.ca/ ___________ elijahlucian@gmail.com)

Music in the mansion made by Azam Ali and uploaded by DeutscheKnecht, and retrieved from:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cPkLhSVtPS4

Music in the dungeons is retrieved from the game Amnesia: The Dark Descent.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out the playthrough commentary made by MusicScene here:

[youtube]LCX7lN3IfOM[/youtube]

And this one by NickGaming:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dg7QPwRXKqM

And this gameplay by Vivaer:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pClvL2DM64k

[color=#FF0000]There are of course SPOILERS[/color]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#FF0000]-:OBS:-[/color]
At one point in the mod your belongings will be taken from you, but you will get everything back in the end. Check the transport.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#008000]-:QnA:- Frequently asked questions. Please look here before you ask in the comment section:[/color] If you don't find your answer here, please use [spoilerREMOVEME] "The Spoiler" [/spoilerREMOVEME] when you ask in the comment section, and if it in any way is a spoiler.

Q1: I'm stuck in the Storage, what do I need to do?
A1: [SPOILER] Blow the rocks away. You remember what the guy said about the bomb right? All the ingredients are in one room. If you had them on you from the beginning it will not work (I know it's a bit weird but that's how I had to do). Have everything in your inventory (3 ingredients plus something to keep the bomb (substance) in (blue cup on the table) and then click on the pot on the lit fire, and it should work. Activate the pile of rocks to proceed. [/SPOILER]

Q2: I'm stuck in the chair at the dinner, and nothing happens. What do I need to do?
A2: First try to reload. If that doesn't work, type "enableplayercontrols" without the quotes in the command console, and speak to the guest to your left.

S1: [SPOILER]The mannequin moving is just a glitch, nothing to do with the mod...[/SPOILER]
A1: Partly wrong. Used the glitch to my advantage.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Is English not your language? Here are some translations:
